name: Color Ships
description:
This game is a space shooter like Space Invaders or Galaga.  The twist is,  there are 2 types of enemies: red and blue. You have to shoot a balance of red or blue enemies to survive. Shoot 2 more of each and it's Game Over!!

Instructions:

Use W and S to move.

Press O and P to shoot red and blue lasers.

This game was made in 3 days for the Score Space Game Jam!!

Please leave feedback on things I could improve. Thanks!
